title: Users are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses they may incur by downloading materials
quoteText:
4. Limitations

In no event shall ControlC or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption,) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on ControlC's Internet site,
